div.class: col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-12 typeofmeditation-item
div.p: These meditations involve focused attention and awareness on the present moment, by observing your natural breath and thought patterns until we are able to move beyond the mind into a place of stillness and silence.

div.class: col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-12 typeofmeditation-item
div.p: These meditations involve incorporating an activity such as walking or a hobby such as painting or dancing through focused concentration where we move into a space of total oneness with our activity and away from the world of multitasking, in order to channel our creativity, intuition and stillness.

div.class: col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-12 typeofmeditation-item
div.p: These meditations involve establishing a deeper spiritual connection with what we may call the universe, divine, higher self in order increase our faith, by moving beyond our mental control into a space of trust, faith and intuition.

div.class: col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-12 typeofmeditation-item
div.p: These meditations involve continuous repetition and chanting of high-energy sounds, vibrations and mantras, which increase our energy vibration, bring us into a space of peace & tranquility & awaken the wisdom and compassion within us.

div.class: col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-12 typeofmeditation-item
div.p: These meditations take you through a beautiful healing journey by guiding your mind and body into a state of deep relaxation through visualization. In this tranquil state, positive reinforcement within the subconscious mind will accelerate the powerful manifestation process of our thoughts into creating an empowering reality.

div.class: col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-12 typeofmeditation-item
div.p: Full moons are about completion, change, releasing and cleansing. Meditating at the time of a full moon offers a powerful healing opportunity supporting you to release blocked energies and limiting beliefs. This powerful guided meditation manifests your dreams and deepest desires, allowing you to come into alignment with your higher self and connect with the endless possibilities the Universe can provide for you.
